title: Snap up outdoor festoon lights for under £35!
content:
Make your outdoor space feel even more inviting with some atmospheric lighting from Cox & Cox.  A stylish lighting solution for your patio, garden or balcony, these warm white drop festoon bulbs will bring an industrial yet elegant look to your space and can be dropped at two different interval heights. What’s more, you can connect up to 100 lights from one power source. With this exclusive deal, you can get these best-selling bulbs for just £34.99, instead of the usual £60 – but hurry, stock is limited!

We have partnered with Cox & Cox to bring you a range of deals. To see all these offers, click here.

Claim your offer!

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Ready to transform your garden with the Extendable Drop Festoon Lights from Cox & Cox? Here’s a bit more about them…

  • 5m lit garland
  • 8m lead cable
  • Can be connected to a maximum of five extension sets
  • Lights must be used with the Festoon Lights – Starter Kit
  • Features 20 warm white lights
  • Transformer must be located indoors
  • Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use
  • Create a string of 100 lights from just one plug

Claim your offer!

Offer ends 13/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
